mapper.sql: id, version_id, operate_type, project_id, sync_system, sync_result, create_uid, create_time, update_uid, update_time, tenant_code
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from version_sync_data
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into version_sync_data (id, version_id, operate_type, project_id, sync_system, sync_result, create_uid, create_time, update_uid, update_time, tenant_code) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{versionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{syncSystem,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{syncResult,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tenantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:

id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
version_id = #{record.versionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

project_id = #{record.projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update_uid = #{record.updateUid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
tenant_code = #{record.tenantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update version_sync_data set version_id = #{versionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operate_type = #{operateType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sync_system = #{syncSystem,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sync_result = #{syncResult,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_uid = #{createUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_uid = #{updateUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tenant_code = #{tenantCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, version_id, operate_type, project_id from version_sync_data where id >= ( select id from version_sync_data where sync_system = 2 and sync_result in (-1,0) order by id limit #{startIndex},1 ) and sync_system = 2 and sync_result in (-1,0) order by id limit #{pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into version_sync_data ( version_id, operate_type, project_id, sync_system, sync_result, create_uid, create_time, update_uid, update_time, tenant_code ) values
( #{item.versionId}, #{item.operateType}, #{item.projectId}, #{item.syncSystem}, #{item.syncResult}, #{item.createUid}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateUid}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.tenantCode} )
